title: Michiko to Hatchin Promotional Movie Streamed
content: The Famitsu game and entertainment news source has begun streaming a new 27-second promotional movie for Michiko to Hatchin, the newest anime from the manglobe studio of Samurai Champloo and Ergo Proxy fame. This promotional movie highlights the voice actresses Yōko Maki and Maki Sakai, who play the free-spirited "sexy diva" fugitive Michiko Malandro and her pursuer Atsuko Jackson, respectively. Michiko to Hatchin will premiere in Japan on October 15.
